|   | Action | Windows/Linux | Mac |
|---------|---------------------|-----------------|-----------------|
| ![](images/insert_chunk){width="20"} | Insert Chunk | Ctrl + Alt + I | Cmd + Option + I |
| **`%>%`** | Insert pipe operator | Ctrl + Shift + M | Cmd + Shift + M |
| **`#`** | Un/Comment out a line | Ctrl + Shift + C | Cmd + Shift + C |
| ![](images/Run_Selected_Line){width="20"} | Run Current line/selection | Ctrl+Enter | Cmd+Return |
| ![](images/Run_Current_Chunk){width="20"} | Run Current Chunk | Ctrl + Alt + C | Cmd + Option + C |
| ![](images/Run_All_Chunks_Above){width="20"} | Run All Chunks Above | Ctrl + Alt + P | Cmd + Option + P |
| ![](images/Render){width="20"} | Render document | Ctrl + Shift + K | Cmd + Shift + K |
| ![](images/undo.png){width="20"} | Undo | Ctrl + Z | Cmd + Z |
| ![](images/cut.png){width="20"} | Cut | Ctrl+X | Cmd+X |
| ![](images/copy.png){width="20"} | Copy | Ctrl+C | Cmd+C |
| ![](images/paste.png){width="20"} | Paste | Ctrl+V | Cmd+V |
